math-inline.name: markup.inserted.math.inline.markdown
math-inline.begin:
(?x) #turn on extended mode
  (?<!^\\)(?<![^\\][\$\\]) #without '$' and '\' on the left
  (\$) #a '$'
  (?![\s\$]) #without whitespace and '$' on the right
  (?=((?!\s\$).)* #not match ' $'
  (?<!\\)((\\{2})*(\\\$)?)(?<!\s)(\$)(?![0-9]) #match the end '$'
  ) #ensure math closed
math-inline.end:
(?x) #turn on extended mode
  (?<![^\\][\$\\])(?<!\s) #without '$' '\' and whitespace on the left
  (\$) #a '$'
  (?![0-9]) #without number on the right
  (?!((\$)(?![\s\$])(?=((?!\s\$).)+((?<![^\\][\$\\])(?<!\s)(\$)(?![0-9]))))) #without a begin '$' on the right

patterns.name: markup.inserted.math.inline.markdown
patterns.comment: match a end '$' and a begin '$'
